name: Mondness
description:
Mondness was made on Unity for  GAMERella Global Edition, with the theme "Journey".

Mondnessby The JellyVixes wins the “I Want to Keep Playing!” award!

Mondness: 

In an alternate reality, you control an Astronaut in search of stars and learn that good times can be won through simple actions.

In the midst of your intergalactic trajectory, you will pass through fickle and unstable places until, finally, you manage to populate your sky and reveal your true face to the player.

Controls: 

- Move the Astronaut around with WASD

- Use  'SPACE' to jump

- Use 'Q' and 'E' to rotate the camera

See more about this project:  Click Here to View the Document

Take the Vision:

We thank all the people who helped build the GAMERella Global event, whether managing the event or participating as a Jammer. Events like this are essential for anyone who wants to develop a game in an inclusive and friendly environment, connecting us with the most diverse people around the world, whether they are beginners or experts in the field of game development. Thank you for creating a welcoming and inspiring environment.
